title: On the structure of the complement of skeleton
authors: Morgan Brown, Jiachang Xu and Muyuan Zhang
abstract:
We study the higher dimensional geometry of Berkovich spaces using open unit
disks, which are given by fibration of relative dimension $1$. Inspired by
birational geometry, we conjecture that the Berkovich skeleton is the
complement of the union of all open unit disks, and prove this conjecture for
$\mathcal{X}$ admitting a strictly semistable model with semiample canonical
class.
